trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona una implementación de la interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> is a complete implementation of a designer loader without anything relating to a persistence format.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> es una implementación completa de un cargador de diseñadores no tiene ninguna relación con un formato de persistencia.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> does not dictate either a text or binary persistence, but it does support the following features:
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> no indica un texto o binario persistencia, pero admite las siguientes características:

trans-unit.source: Multiple load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Varias dependencias de carga.

trans-unit.source: Tracking changes within the designer.
trans-unit.target: Seguimiento de los cambios en el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Deferred idle-time reloading.
trans-unit.target: Aplazado recargar el tiempo de inactividad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> adds two kinds of services to the designer host’s service container: replaceable services and irreplaceable services.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> agrega dos tipos de servicios al contenedor de servicios del host del diseñador: servicios reemplazables y los servicios no reemplazables.

trans-unit.source: You can replace a replaceable service by changing the value of the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Puede reemplazar un servicio reemplazable cambiando el valor de la protegido <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: You cannot replace irreplaceable services because their implementations depend on each other.
trans-unit.target: No se puede reemplazar los servicios no reemplazables porque sus implementaciones dependen entre sí.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the services that are provided by default.
trans-unit.target: En la tabla siguiente se describe los servicios que se proporcionan de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Default Service
trans-unit.target: Servicio predeterminado

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descripción

trans-unit.source: Allows objects to request that the designer reload itself when it is idle.
trans-unit.target: Permite a los objetos solicitar que el diseñador recargue por sí mismo cuando está inactivo.

trans-unit.source: This is a replaceable service.
trans-unit.target: Se trata de un servicio reemplazable.

trans-unit.source: Used to serialize and deserialize objects.
trans-unit.target: Se usa para serializar y deserializar objetos.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager is added as a service so objects that need to perform serialization can utilize any serialization providers that were added to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: El Administrador de serialización se agrega como un servicio para que los objetos que necesitan para realizar la serialización pueden utilizar cualquier proveedor de serialización que se han agregado al administrador de serialización.

trans-unit.source: This is an irreplaceable service.
trans-unit.target: Se trata de un servicio irreemplazable.

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener acceso completo a los recursos del sistema.

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: Valores de petición: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: Estado asociado:

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: The designer loader host to load.
trans-unit.target: Host del cargador de diseñadores que se va a cargar.

trans-unit.source: Starts the loading process.
trans-unit.target: Inicia el proceso de carga.

trans-unit.source: This is an implementation of the abstract <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Se trata de una implementación de abstracto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to override this method in your own class.
trans-unit.target: No es necesario invalidar este método en su propia clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> método realiza las siguientes acciones:

trans-unit.source: It verifies that the design surface has not already loaded.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba que la superficie de diseño no se ha cargado.

trans-unit.source: On the first call, it adds relevant services and calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En la primera llamada, agrega los servicios relevantes y llama el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Lo llama el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>, y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: If the designer loader service has not been removed from the service container, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> methods instead of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Si el servicio de cargador de diseñadores no se ha quitado del contenedor de servicios, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> llamará el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> métodos en lugar de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: In this situation, it is the responsibility of the designer loader service to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En esta situación, es responsabilidad del servicio de cargador de diseñadores para llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="host" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="host" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The designer is already loaded, or <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost)" /> has been called with a different designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: El diseñador ya está cargado o se ha llamado a <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost)" /> con un host de cargador de diseñadores diferente.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="host" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Se ha eliminado <paramref name="host" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> method does not flush changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Llamar a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> método no vuelca cambios en el cargador de diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: If you want changes to be saved, call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> before calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si desea que los cambios se guarden, llame a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> antes de llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> cuando haya terminado de usar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> deja el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>, debe liberar todas las referencias a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> estaba ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, los recursos que está usando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> del objeto `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable component notification by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />; <see langword="false" /> to disable component notification by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para habilitar la notificación de componentes por parte del objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />; es <see langword="false" /> para deshabilitar la notificación de componentes por parte del objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables component notification with the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />.
trans-unit.target: Habilita o deshabilita la notificación de componentes con el objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the component notification was enabled prior to this call; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la notificación de componentes se ha habilitado antes de esta llamada; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Flushes pending changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Vacía los cambios pendientes y los escribe en el cargador de diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: If the designer loader has not been loaded or has not been marked as modified, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method returns immediately.
trans-unit.target: Si el cargador de diseñadores no se ha cargado o no se ha marcado como modificado, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> método vuelve inmediatamente.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> asks the serialization manager to create a serialization session and then calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> pide al administrador de serialización para crear una sesión de serialización y, a continuación, se llama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the service.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del servicio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested service.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el servicio solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The requested service, or <see langword="null" /> if the requested service cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Servicio solicitado o <see langword="null" /> si no se encuentra el servicio solicitado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.GetService%2A> is a helper method that allows classes deriving from <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> to access services offered by the designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.GetService%2A> es un método auxiliar que permite que las clases que deriven de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> acceder a los servicios ofrecidos por el host del cargador de diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: Initializes services.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa los servicios.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method is called the first time <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is invoked.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> método se llama por primera vez <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> se invoca.

trans-unit.source: You can add any services necessary to the designer loader host at this time.
trans-unit.target: Puede agregar los servicios necesarios para el host del cargador de diseñadores en este momento.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation adds services that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> provides, so after calling the base implementation you may replace existing services.
trans-unit.target: La implementación base agrega los servicios que <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> proporciona, por lo que puede reemplazar los servicios existentes después de llamar a la implementación base.

trans-unit.source: You must remove any custom services you add here by overriding <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Debe quitar cualquier servicio personalizado que agregue aquí reemplazando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: No se ha inicializado la interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Se ha eliminado <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the designer should be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: Indica si se debe volver a cargar el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer should be reloaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se debe volver a cargar el diseñador; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada siempre devuelve <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.IsReloadNeeded%2A> method is used by some designer loaders to optimize reloading.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.IsReloadNeeded%2A> método lo usa algunos cargadores de diseñadores para optimizar la recarga.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden if your designer loader supports intelligent reloading.
trans-unit.target: Este método puede reemplazarse si el cargador de diseñadores admite la recarga inteligente.

trans-unit.source: Some designer loaders can detect changes made to their underlying document and determine if a reload of the designer is actually necessary.
trans-unit.target: Algunos cargadores de diseñadores pueden detectar los cambios realizados en su documento subyacente y determinar si una recarga del diseñador es realmente necesaria.

trans-unit.source: If not, they should return `false` from this method.
trans-unit.target: Si no es así, debe devolver `false` desde este método.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns `true`, indicating that any call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> will succeed.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada siempre devuelve `true`, que indica que todas las llamadas a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> se realizará correctamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the loader host.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el host del cargador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> that was passed to the <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> que se ha pasado al método <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost)" />.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the loader host that was given to this designer loader.
trans-unit.target: Este método devuelve el host del cargador que se asignó a este cargador de diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: This can be `null` if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> has not been called yet, or if this designer loader has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Esto puede ser `null` si <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> no se ha llamado todavía, o si se ha eliminado el cargador de diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: No se ha inicializado la interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Se ha eliminado <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer loader is loading the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si el cargador de diseñadores está cargando la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer loader is currently loading the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el cargador de diseñadores está cargando actualmente la superficie de diseño; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>, which supports load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> clase proporciona el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService>, que admite las dependencias de carga.

trans-unit.source: This property takes load dependencies into account and will return `true` if there are any outstanding load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad toma las dependencias de carga en la cuenta y se devuelto `true` si no hay ninguna dependencia de carga pendiente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si se ha modificado el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer has been modified; otherwise, <see langword="false" />,
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si el diseñador se ha modificado; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the designer loader has detected that the designer has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Determina si el cargador de diseñadores ha detectado que se ha modificado el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true` when the designer loader’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method is called, the designer loader will call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si esta propiedad es `true` cuando el cargador de diseñadores <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> se llama al método, el cargador de diseñadores llamará el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: Notifica al cargador de diseñadores que la carga está a punto de comenzar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> method is invoked to start the loading process.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> se invoca el método para iniciar el proceso de carga.

trans-unit.source: You should perform any necessary initialization for loading at this time.
trans-unit.target: Debe realizar cualquier inicialización necesaria para cargar en este momento.

trans-unit.source: This method should not be used to perform the actual load.
trans-unit.target: Este método no debe usarse para realizar la carga real.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation disables change notifications and sets up the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> for loading.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada deshabilita las notificaciones de cambio y configura el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> para cargar.

trans-unit.source: If you implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> to provide dependent load support, you should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> when the first dependent load occurs.
trans-unit.target: Si implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> para proporcionar compatibilidad de carga dependiente, debe llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> cuando se produce la primera carga dependiente.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method after the last call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Llame a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> método después de la última llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> and does this for you.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> y hace automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is not available when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is called, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will directly call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> no está disponible cuando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> se llama, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> llama directamente a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Si proporciona su propio servicio de cargador, o si decide no proporcionan un servicio de cargador, es responsables de llamar a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is available, or directly if it is not.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> método llamará automáticamente esto, indirectamente mediante una llamada a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23AddLoadDependency%2A> si <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> está disponible, o directamente si no lo está.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that unloading is about to begin.
trans-unit.target: Notifica al cargador de diseñadores que la descarga está a punto de comenzar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginUnload%2A> method is invoked when the designer loader is about to unload the document.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginUnload%2A> método se invoca cuando el cargador de diseñadores está a punto de descargar el documento.

trans-unit.source: The document may be unloaded in preparation for reloading, or if the document failed to load.
trans-unit.target: El documento se puede descargar como preparación para volver a cargar, o si no se pudo cargar el documento.

trans-unit.source: If you added document-specific services in <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>, remove them here.
trans-unit.target: Si ha agregado servicios específicos de documento en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A>, quitarlos aquí.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the load completed successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si la carga se ha realizado correctamente; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing objects (usually exceptions) that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contiene objetos (normalmente excepciones) respecto a lo cuales se han creado informes de error.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: Notifica al cargador de diseñadores que se ha completado la carga.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method is invoked when loading is finished.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> método se invoca cuando finaliza la carga.

trans-unit.source: It is always called, even if an exception is thrown during loading.
trans-unit.target: Se llama siempre, incluso si se produce una excepción durante la carga.

trans-unit.source: The value of `successful` will be set to `true` if the load succeeded, or `false` if a fatal error occurred.
trans-unit.target: El valor de `successful` se establecerá en `true` si la carga se realizó correctamente, o `false` si se ha producido un error irrecuperable.

trans-unit.source: The `errors` collection will contain objects that were reported as errors.
trans-unit.target: El `errors` colección contiene objetos que se notifican como errores.

trans-unit.source: Usually, these objects are exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, estos objetos son las excepciones.

trans-unit.source: If you implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> to provide dependent load support, you should call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method after the last call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> para proporcionar compatibilidad de carga dependiente, debe llamar a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> método después de la última llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> and does this for you.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader> implementa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> y hace automáticamente.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is not available when <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> is called, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> will directly call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> after calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> no está disponible cuando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> se llama, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> llama directamente a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> después de llamar a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called by the designer loader service when all dependent loads have been completed.
trans-unit.target: El servicio de cargador de diseñadores debe llamar a este método cuando se hayan completado todas las cargas dependientes.

trans-unit.source: This stops the loading process that was initiated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esto detiene el proceso de carga que fue iniciado por el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Si proporciona su propio servicio de cargador, o si decide no proporcionan un servicio de cargador, es responsables de llamar a este método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> is available, or directly if it is not.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.BeginLoad%2A> método llamará automáticamente esto, indirectamente mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> método si <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService> está disponible, o directamente si no lo está.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: No se ha inicializado la interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Se ha eliminado <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer loader that the state of the document is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: Notifica al cargador de diseñadores que está a punto de modificarse el estado del documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnModifying%2A> method is called in response to a component changing, adding, or removing event which indicates that the designer is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnModifying%2A> se llama al método en respuesta a un cambio de componente, agregar, o quitar el evento que indica que el diseñador va a modificarse.

trans-unit.source: You can implement source code control by overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: Puede implementar el control de código fuente mediante la invalidación de este método.

trans-unit.source: A call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnModifying%2A> does not mean that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A> property will later be set to `true`; it merely indicates an intention to do so.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnModifying%2A> no significa que la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Modified%2A> propiedad más adelante se establecerá en `true`; simplemente indica una intención de hacerlo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for persisting the state of loaded designers.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> que se va a utilizar para conservar el estado de los diseñadores cargados.

trans-unit.source: Flushes all changes to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Vacía todos los cambios realizados en el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> method is invoked when the designer loader needs to flush to persistence any changes made to the designers.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> método se invoca cuando el cargador de diseñadores necesita vaciar en la persistencia de los cambios realizados en los diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: It is invoked in response to a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se invoca en respuesta a una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> to use for loading state for the designers.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> que se va a utilizar para cargar el estado de los diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: Loads a designer from persistence.
trans-unit.target: Carga un diseñador desde la persistencia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> method is invoked when the designer loader needs to load its state.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> método se invoca cuando el cargador de diseñadores necesita cargar su estado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> is called before the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.PerformLoad%2A> se llama antes de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.OnBeginLoad%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You must implement this method to load the designer contents.
trans-unit.target: Debe implementar este método para cargar el contenido del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property provider for the serialization manager being used by the loader.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el proveedor de propiedades para el administrador de serialización que utiliza el cargador.

trans-unit.source: An object whose properties are to be provided to the serialization manager.
trans-unit.target: Objeto cuyas propiedades se van a proporcionar al administrador de serialización.

trans-unit.source: The serialization manager provides a `Properties` property on its primary interface that can be read by serializers to customize their serialization to specific needs.
trans-unit.target: El Administrador de serialización proporciona una `Properties` propiedad en su interfaz principal que se pueden leer los serializadores para personalizar su serialización para necesidades específicas.

trans-unit.source: The properties that are examined by the serializers vary depending on the type of serializer used.
trans-unit.target: Las propiedades que se examinan los serializadores varían según el tipo de serializador que usa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: No se ha inicializado la interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Combinación bit a bit de los valores de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: Queues a reload of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Pone en la cola una recarga del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> method can be invoked by the designer loader to request a reload of the designer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload%2A> método puede invocarse mediante el cargador de diseñadores para solicitar una recarga del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Because reloads are performed at idle time, this method does not actually reload the designer; it just queues the reload.
trans-unit.target: Dado que vuelve a cargar se realiza en tiempo de inactividad, este método no realmente volver a cargar el diseñador; pone en cola simplemente la recarga.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a reload has been queued.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que indica si se ha puesto en la cola una recarga.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if a call to <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions)" /> has queued a reload request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si una llamada a <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Reload(System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReloadOptions)" /> ha puesto en la cola una solicitud de recarga; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing error objects, usually exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contiene objetos de error, normalmente excepciones.

trans-unit.source: Reports errors that occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: Crea informes sobre los errores que se han producido al vaciar los cambios.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReportFlushErrors%2A> method is called during <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> if one or more errors occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReportFlushErrors%2A> método se llama durante la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> si se ha producido uno o varios errores al vaciar los cambios.

trans-unit.source: The values in the `errors` collection can be exceptions or objects with <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> values that describe the error.
trans-unit.target: Los valores de la `errors` colección puede ser excepciones u objetos con <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> valores que describen el error.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReportFlushErrors%2A> raises the last exception in the collection.
trans-unit.target: La implementación predeterminada de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.ReportFlushErrors%2A> provoca la última excepción de la colección.

trans-unit.source: One or more errors occurred while flushing changes.
trans-unit.target: Se produjeron uno o varios errores al vaciar los cambios.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the full name of the component to be designed.
trans-unit.target: Cadena que representa el nombre completo del componente que se va a diseñar.

trans-unit.source: Sets the full class name of the base component.
trans-unit.target: Establece el nombre completo de clase del componente base.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.SetBaseComponentClassName%2A> method should be called during loading to establish the full name of the component a designer is designing.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.SetBaseComponentClassName%2A> método debe llamarse durante la carga para establecer el nombre completo del componente que está diseñando un diseñador.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers an external component as part of the load process managed by <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService" />.
trans-unit.target: Registra un componente externo como parte del proceso de carga administrado por <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService" />.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> method once for each external object participating in the load process.
trans-unit.target: Llame a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> método una vez para cada objeto externo que participa en el proceso de carga.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> method is called when the work of the load process is done.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> método se llama cuando se realiza el trabajo del proceso de carga.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: No se ha inicializado la interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to load successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si la carga se ha realizado correctamente; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> containing errors that occurred during the load.
trans-unit.target: Interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> que contiene los errores que se han producido durante la carga.

trans-unit.source: Signals that a dependent load has finished.
trans-unit.target: Indica que ha finalizado una carga dependiente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> method is called to signal that a dependent loading operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23DependentLoadComplete%2A> método se llama para indicar que se ha completado una operación de carga dependiente.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> method once for every process that was registered by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> method, which has already completed.
trans-unit.target: Llame a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.DependentLoadComplete%2A> método una vez por cada proceso que se registró mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.AddLoadDependency%2A> método, que ya se ha completado.

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load succeeds, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `true` and passes either an empty collection or `null` to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Si la carga dependiente se realiza correctamente, el llamador establece el `successful` parámetro `true` y pasa una colección vacía o `null` a la `errorCollection` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: If the dependent load encounters errors, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `false` and passes a collection of exceptions that indicate the reason or reasons for failure to the `errorCollection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Si producen errores en la carga dependiente, el llamador establece el `successful` parámetro `false` y pasa una colección de excepciones que indiquen la causa o causas del error para el `errorCollection` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: No load dependencies have been added by <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System#ComponentModel#Design#Serialization#IDesignerLoaderService#AddLoadDependency" />, or the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has not been initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System#ComponentModel#Design#Serialization#IDesignerLoaderService#AddLoadDependency" /> no ha agregado ninguna dependencia de carga o no se ha inicializado la interfaz <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Se ha eliminado <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the design document.
trans-unit.target: Recarga el documento de diseño.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reload request is accepted; <see langword="false" /> if the loader does not allow the reload.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se acepta la petición de recarga; <see langword="false" /> si el cargador no permite la recarga.

trans-unit.source: Any object can call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23Reload%2A> method to request that the loader reload the design document.
trans-unit.target: Puede llamar cualquier objeto del <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.System%23ComponentModel%23Design%23Serialization%23IDesignerLoaderService%23Reload%2A> método para solicitar que el cargador vuelva a cargar el documento de diseño.

trans-unit.source: If the loader supports reloading and complies with the reload, the designer loader can return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Si el cargador admite recargas y acepta la recarga, puede devolver el cargador de diseñadores `true`.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns `false`, indicating that the reload will not occur.
trans-unit.target: De lo contrario, devuelve `false`, que indica que no se efectuará la recarga.

trans-unit.source: Callers cannot rely on the reload happening immediately; the designer loader can schedule this for some other time, or it can try to reload the designer at once.
trans-unit.target: Los llamadores no pueden depender de la recarga tenga lugar inmediatamente; el cargador de diseñadores puede programar para más tarde, o puede intentar volver a cargar el diseñador a la vez.

trans-unit.source: The caller can display a message to the user if the designer cannot be reloaded.
trans-unit.target: El llamador puede mostrar un mensaje al usuario si no se puede volver a cargar el diseñador.
